articles.title: Michaela DePrince: America's trailblazing ballerina dies at 29 - BBC.com
articles.description: A war orphan from Sierra Leone, DePrince moved to the US and ended up performing with Beyoncé.
articles.content:
Ballerina Michaela Mabinty DePrince, who performed with Beyoncé and was seen by many as a trailblazer, has died at the age of 29.
A spokesperson announced her death on her personal Instagram page an… [+3834 chars]

articles.author: WAFAA SHURAFA, ANDREW WILKS
articles.title: An American activist killed by Israeli fire is buried in Turkey as Israel strikes Gaza - The Associated Press
articles.description: A Turkish-American activist who was killed by Israeli fire in the West Bank has been laid to rest in her hometown in Turkey with thousands lining the streets and anti-Israeli feelings in the country rising. A witness said that Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, a 26-year-old…
articles.content: ISTANBUL, Turkey (AP) A Turkish-American activist who was killed by Israeli fire in the West Bank was laid to rest on Saturday in her hometown in Turkey with thousands lining the streets and anti-Isr… [+5531 chars]
